Text.Page:
The sikandari heretics are entrenched at the Temple of Sikander. We need to break through this stalemate.

Please kill the sikandari {@LinkCreature:57#7#defenders}, {@LinkCreature:57#8#lifebringers}, and {@LinkCreature:57#10#champions}.

Report to Sulis at Broken Bridge Camp when the mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
